original_text: As soon as Asa heard these words, the prophecy of Azariah the son of Oded, he took courage and put away the detestable idols from all the land of Judah and Benjamin and from the cities that he had taken in the hill country of Ephraim, and he repaired the altar of the Lord that was in front of the vestibule of the house of the Lord.
korean_text: 아사가 이 말 곧 선지자 오뎃의 예언을 듣고 마음을 강하게 하여 가증한 물건들을 유다와 베냐민 온 땅에서 없애고 또 에브라임 산지에서 빼앗은 성읍들에서도 없애고 또 여호와의 낭실 앞에 있는 여호와의 제단을 재건하고

sentences.original_text: As soon as Asa heard these words,
the prophecy of Azariah the son of Oded,
and put away the detestable idols
from all the land of Judah and Benjamin
and from the cities that he had taken
in the hill country of Ephraim,
and he repaired the altar of the Lord
that was in front of the vestibule of the house of the Lord.
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 성전 낭실 앞에 있던 것을입니다.
